title: What services does ZILLAM offer?
text: ZILLAM provides a wide range of home services including electrical work, carpentry, plumbing, and cleaning. Our skilled professionals handle everything from inspections and repairs to installations and routine maintenance.

title: Are the professionals background-checked?
text: Yes, all professionals on ZILLAM are thoroughly vetted, including background checks, certifications, and experience verification, ensuring that you receive trustworthy, reliable service.

title: How do I book a service through the app?
text: Simply download the ZILLAM app, select the service you need, choose a date and time, and we'll match you with a qualified professional. Youâ€™ll receive a confirmation and can track the status of your appointment.

title: Can I reschedule or cancel my appointment?
text: Yes, you can easily reschedule or cancel your appointment directly through the app, subject to our terms and conditions. We aim to provide flexibility to meet your needs.
